answers.answer: I have not experienced it but it helps that you know it and you can start working on minimising it early on. Working with a dietician and your doctor shd go a long way in having a healthy pregnancy.  And congrats!

Right now im working with my dietician to prevent me from getting gestational diabeties cause I  borderline. They have really helped me. I cut out all pop,juice and white bread etc. I am 23 wks tomorrow and I have lost 20 lbs and my baby is healthy. I say now that ur pregnant and know u have had problems in the past, that u can change ur life style sooner and get control of it or better yet not have it at all.I got checked early on for diabeties so im guessing that's what they are going to do this time around with you. Good luck I hope this helps

Thank you ladies..trying to be proactive and watch much carb and sugar intake now..just have to be careful on weight loss too much right now wouldn't be good. I really don't want to have to poke my finger 3times a day again! Good luck to ya!

question: Hello! Just found out Im preg about 8 wks along. My oldest 13 & i had slight pre eclampsia after he was born 4wks early and my 10 yr was 7.3wks early due to severe HELLP complicated with GD. Im so nervous as i am also Rh neg...first appt Tue..can't stop worrying.anyone expierenced something similar?
title: previous HELLP & gestational diabetes over 35 &nervous
